docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self brc:Record native brc:Record

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
<pre><code>name: Record
description: Defines the bibliographic metadata about a particular work or record.
  Depending on product type, various elements are permitted, not permitted, or required.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/brc_schema
attributes:
  osti_id:
    name: osti_id
    description: Unique identifier for OSTI record, only required for updates.
    examples:
    - value: '9999'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - MediaSet
    range: integer
    required: true
  identifiers:
    name: identifiers
    description: List of identifying numbers related to this record
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - Organization
    range: Identifier
    multivalued: true
  issue:
    name: issue
    description: Issue number for journals or other applicable products if any.
    examples:
    - value: '44'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,80}$
  journal_license_url:
    name: journal_license_url
    description: URL for information regarding the journal license for information
    examples:
    - value: https://journal-publishers.com/license/3.02/text
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,255}$
  journal_name:
    name: journal_name
    description: Name of journal publishing this information
    examples:
    - value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,250}$
  journal_open_access_flag:
    name: journal_open_access_flag
    description: Indicates if the journal article is available in an open access journal,
      indicated as Y for open, N for not, or left blank/omitted if not applicable
      or unknown status.
    examples:
    - value: N
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,1}$
  journal_type:
    name: journal_type
    description: Specific sub-type of the journal article.  For product type JA only.
      Further qualifies the type of record.
    examples:
    - value: AM
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,2}$
  revision:
    name: revision
    description: Revision number (sequence) for this record.
    examples:
    - value: '1'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - MediaSet
    - MediaFile
    range: integer
  workflow_status:
    name: workflow_status
    description: Workflow status of current revision of record.
    examples:
    - value: SO
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: WorkflowStatusEnum
  access_limitations:
    name: access_limitations
    description: Access/distribution limitation codes to describe the distribution
      rules and limitations for this work.
    examples:
    - value: UNL
    - value: OPN
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - MediaSet
    range: AccessLimitationsEnum
    required: true
    multivalued: true
    pattern: ^.{0,5}$
  access_limitation_other:
    name: access_limitation_other
    description: 'Additional information about access/distribution limitation for
      this record, if needed. Required for CUI or PDOUO designations in access limitation.
      May contain information about the following: Special handling instructions,
      Copyright restrictions, Other criteria pertinent to the review, access limitation,
      announcement, and/or restriction of this STI product.'
    examples:
    - value: Restricted to US Distribution Only by DOE Order.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  added_by:
    name: added_by
    description: E-Link user ID that initially entered this record. Value internally
      maintained by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '28931'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - MediaSet
    range: integer
  added_by_email:
    name: added_by_email
    description: E-Link account email address initially entering this record. Value
      maintained by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: ensorn@osti.gov
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  added_by_name:
    name: added_by_name
    description: E-Link user name initially entering this record. Value maintained
      by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: Neal Ensor
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  announcement_codes:
    name: announcement_codes
    description: List of announcement codes for this record.
    examples:
    - value: EDB
    - value: INIS
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  edition:
    name: edition
    description: Edition number, as applicable to Books or other products.
    examples:
    - value: '2023'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,10}$
  volume:
    name: volume
    description: A volume number as applicable, usually for journals or books.
    examples:
    - value: '1'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,68}$
  collection_type:
    name: collection_type
    description: Indicates the OSTI collection type originally creating this record.
      Maintained internally by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: DOE_LAB
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: CollectionTypeEnum
  conference_information:
    name: conference_information
    description: '"Describes the conference pertaining to this record, if any; usually
      name and / or location the event took place.""'
    examples:
    - value: ApacheCON 2019 discussion panel
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  conference_type:
    name: conference_type
    description: Code representing the type of conference-related work of this record.
      Generally, only applicable to CO type submissions.
    examples:
    - value: O
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,1}$
  contract_award_date:
    name: contract_award_date
    description: Date contract for this record was awarded.
    examples:
    - value: '2012-02-19T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  country_publication_code:
    name: country_publication_code
    description: Country of publication for this record
    examples:
    - value: US
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,5}$
  date_metadata_added:
    name: date_metadata_added
    description: Date record first entered the OSTI system. Value internally maintained
      by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '2023-09-22T18:31:32.043Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  date_metadata_updated:
    name: date_metadata_updated
    description: Date of this revision of the record. Value internally maintained
      by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '2020-04-02T12:33:17.553Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  date_submitted_to_osti_first:
    name: date_submitted_to_osti_first
    description: Date record was first submitted to OSTI for publication. Maintained
      internally by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '2019-04-04T08:25:12.234Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  date_submitted_to_osti_last:
    name: date_submitted_to_osti_last
    description: Most recent date record information was submitted to OSTI. Maintained
      internally by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '2018-05-04T11:44:23.864Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  title:
    name: title
    description: Title of record.  For Book Chapters, the title of the chapter.
    examples:
    - value: Sample document title
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    domain_of:
    - Dataset
    - RelatedItem
    - Record
    range: string
    required: true
  description:
    name: description
    description: Description or abstract for this record. Required to have a value
      for grantee submissions.
    examples:
    - value: Information about a particular record, report, or other document, or
        executive summary or abstract of same.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    domain_of:
    - Dataset
    - Plasmid
    - Record
    range: string
  descriptors:
    name: descriptors
    description: List of descriptor codes for this record
    examples:
    - value: ATMOSPHERE
    - value: ELECTRONS
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  doe_funded_flag:
    name: doe_funded_flag
    description: Indicates if the record is primarily DOE-funded. Indicate Y for Yes,
      N for no, or leave blank/omit if unknown status.
    examples:
    - value: Y
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,1}$
  doi:
    name: doi
    description: The DOI for this record, if any.  Enter value if previously assigned
      a DOI for the record from an outside service.  If not supplied, OSTI may assign
      a DOI for the work for certain applicable record types.
    examples:
    - value: 10.5072/2020/238479ax
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  doi_infix:
    name: doi_infix
    description: '"Any customized infix value for the DOI used when generating a DOI
      reference. The following characters should be avoided in the infix value: ;/?:@&=+$,."'
    examples:
    - value: Climate2019
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  edited_by:
    name: edited_by
    description: OSTI user ID making this revision of the metadata record. Value internally
      maintained by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: '112389'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: integer
  edited_by_email:
    name: edited_by_email
    description: E-Link user email address that created this revision of the metadata
      record. Value maintained by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: harrisonm@site.gov
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  edited_by_name:
    name: edited_by_name
    description: E-Link user name that created this revision of the metadata record.
      Value maintained by E-Link.
    examples:
    - value: Mark Harrison
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  edit_reason:
    name: edit_reason
    description: Value provided by user editing a record describing the reason for
      the edit.
    examples:
    - value: Modified title and authors.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  edit_source:
    name: edit_source
    description: Value determined based on type of edit and user performing the association.
    examples:
    - value: NORMAL_WEBFORM
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  format_information:
    name: format_information
    description: Information about the format of the product, including any operating
      system or program requirements for use of the data, as applicable.
    examples:
    - value: Originally Word Perfect 4.2 document
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  media_embargo_sunset_date:
    name: media_embargo_sunset_date
    description: Indicates date on which the document embargo ends, if applicable.
    examples:
    - value: 7/6/2022
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  publication_date:
    name: publication_date
    description: Date of publication of this record.  For Thesis/Dissertation records,
      this may also be the completion date of the Thesis.  For Patents, the date the
      patent was issued or approved.
    examples:
    - value: '2009-06-12T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
    required: true
  publication_date_text:
    name: publication_date_text
    description: String representation of the publication date (e.g., Summer 2001)
    examples:
    - value: Winter 2012
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  publisher_information:
    name: publisher_information
    description: Publisher-specific information if applicable
    examples:
    - value: University Press, Volume III Spring 2001
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,400}$
  related_doc_info:
    name: related_doc_info
    description: Additional information regarding the document.  Considered historical
      or deprecated information, provided for access to historical data. This field
      is NOT recommended for new submissions.
    examples:
    - value: Reprint Spring 2012
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,2255}$
  keywords:
    name: keywords
    description: Concise set of key words for this record
    examples:
    - value: NUCLEAR
    - value: REACTIONS
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    domain_of:
    - Dataset
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  languages:
    name: languages
    description: Language codes for this record
    examples:
    - value: English
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  audit_logs:
    name: audit_logs
    description: Listing of any audit logs of actions taken and worker interactions
      performed on this metadata revision, if any.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: AuditLog
    multivalued: true
  media:
    name: media
    description: Listing of any media and files associated with this record, along
      with various metadata information and status data for each.  Empty if no media
      is currently associated with this record.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: MediaSet
    multivalued: true
  opn_addressee:
    name: opn_addressee
    description: For OpenNET records, the addressee information
    examples:
    - value: Forestall Bldg A-113
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  opn_declassified_date:
    name: opn_declassified_date
    description: For OpenNET records, the date information was declassified
    examples:
    - value: 03/02/2018
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  opn_declassified_status:
    name: opn_declassified_status
    description: For OpenNET records, status of declassification of information
    examples:
    - value: N
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  opn_document_categories:
    name: opn_document_categories
    description: For OpenNET records, list of any document categories pertaining to
      this record
    examples:
    - value: Chemistry
    - value: Geothermal
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  opn_document_location:
    name: opn_document_location
    examples:
    - value: US Department of Science, Office 201
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  opn_fieldoffice_acronym_code:
    name: opn_fieldoffice_acronym_code
    examples:
    - value: THX-1138
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,10}$
  organizations:
    name: organizations
    description: List of organizations related to this record. For submissions, at
      least SPONSOR and RESEARCHING organization is required.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: Organization
    multivalued: true
  other_information:
    name: other_information
    description: Information useful to include in published announcements which is
      not suited for other fields.
    examples:
    - value: Published in Nature, Fall 2012
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  ouo_release_date:
    name: ouo_release_date
    description: Date of OUO access limitation expiration if applicable.
    examples:
    - value: '1997-05-09 10:23:44'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  paper_flag:
    name: paper_flag
    description: Indicates if OSTI has or had a paper copy of this product.
    examples:
    - value: 'true'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: boolean
  patent_assignee:
    name: patent_assignee
    description: The holder of property rights to a patent.
    examples:
    - value: United Property Holdings, LLC
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  patent_file_date:
    name: patent_file_date
    description: Date patent was filed with US Patent Office.
    examples:
    - value: '2018-04-08T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  patent_priority_date:
    name: patent_priority_date
    examples:
    - value: '2004-07-12T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  pdouo_exemption_number:
    name: pdouo_exemption_number
    description: Exception number for PDOUO access limitation records. Multiple values
      may be delimited by semi-colons.
    examples:
    - value: '278324'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  persons:
    name: persons
    description: List of persons (authors, contributors, etc.) related to this record.
      For submissions, at least one AUTHOR or CONTRIBUTING Person, along with a RELEASE
      contact, is required.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: Person
    multivalued: true
  product_size:
    name: product_size
    description: Information regarding physical size of media or report, if applicable.
    examples:
    - value: 227 pages
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,50}$
  product_type:
    name: product_type
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: ProductType
    pattern: ^.{0,2}$
  product_type_other:
    name: product_type_other
    description: Additional information for 'OTHER' product types.  Required if 'OT'
      product type is specified for this record.
    examples:
    - value: Preprint
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,200}$
  prot_flag:
    name: prot_flag
    description: Indicates the type of protected data described by this record. PROT
      must be specified in the access limitations.
    examples:
    - value: EPACT
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,5}$
  prot_data_other:
    name: prot_data_other
    description: Information regarding why the information is protected if not a CRADA
      product.
    examples:
    - value: PROTECTED
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,80}$
  prot_release_date:
    name: prot_release_date
    description: The date on which data protections for this record will end.
    examples:
    - value: '2023-07-23T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  availability:
    name: availability
    description: Describes record's availibility information.
    examples:
    - value: Also available at https://sample.com/document/report.pdf
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  subject_category_code:
    name: subject_category_code
    description: Set two-character subject category code values for this record
    examples:
    - value: '2'
    - value: '31'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
    pattern: ^.{0,2}$
  subject_category_code_legacy:
    name: subject_category_code_legacy
    description: Any legacy or historical subject category codes for this report
    examples:
    - value: Political Science
    - value: Geosciences
    - value: Physics
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  related_identifiers:
    name: related_identifiers
    description: List of related identifiers connected to this record
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: RelatedIdentifier
    multivalued: true
  released_to_osti_date:
    name: released_to_osti_date
    description: Date record information was released to OSTI, as entered by releasing
      official.
    examples:
    - value: '2019-06-03T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  releasing_official_comments:
    name: releasing_official_comments
    description: Any comments made by the releasing official on the record.
    examples:
    - value: Final report due January 2021.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  report_period_end_date:
    name: report_period_end_date
    examples:
    - value: '2023-01-14T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  report_period_start_date:
    name: report_period_start_date
    examples:
    - value: '2023-01-05T00:00:00.000Z'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  report_types:
    name: report_types
    description: The type(s) of information or frequency of reporting of information
      in this report.
    examples:
    - value: F
    - value: B
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  report_type_other:
    name: report_type_other
    description: Detail information about 'Other' report types.
    examples:
    - value: OTHERVALUE
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,80}$
  sbiz_flag:
    name: sbiz_flag
    description: Indicates if this metadata is SBIR or STTR related.
    examples:
    - value: SBIR
    - value: STTR
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,6}$
  sbiz_phase:
    name: sbiz_phase
    description: A three-character field constrained to 'I', 'II', 'IIA', 'IIB', or
      'III' indicating the phase of this SBIR/STTR report.
    examples:
    - value: IIB
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,3}$
  sbiz_previous_contract_number:
    name: sbiz_previous_contract_number
    description: The previous SBIR/STTR contract number if a Phase III SBIR/STTR report.
    examples:
    - value: SMPL-2023-1291
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,14}$
  sbiz_release_date:
    name: sbiz_release_date
    description: Date data protections on this SBIR/STTR record will expire.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  site_ownership_code:
    name: site_ownership_code
    description: Code of the DOE site submitting this document
    examples:
    - value: BNL
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,10}$
  site_unique_id:
    name: site_unique_id
    description: Site-specified unique accession number for this record
    examples:
    - value: '89345'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  site_url:
    name: site_url
    description: (DATASET product type only) The URL of the data set landing page,
      containing links to data set content or additional information as required.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  source_input_type:
    name: source_input_type
    description: Value determined by submission type at record creation time. Defines
      how E-Link record was first entered into the system.
    examples:
    - value: DOE_GRANT_WEBFORM
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  source_edit_type:
    name: source_edit_type
    description: Value determined by submission type for each edit or revision of
      a record. Changes on a per-revision basis.
    examples:
    - value: DOE_LAB_API
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  geolocations:
    name: geolocations
    description: List of geolocation references for this record.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: Geolocation
    multivalued: true

</code></pre>

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
<pre><code>name: Record
description: Defines the bibliographic metadata about a particular work or record.
  Depending on product type, various elements are permitted, not permitted, or required.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/brc_schema
attributes:
  osti_id:
    name: osti_id
    description: Unique identifier for OSTI record, only required for updates.
    examples:
    - value: '9999'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: osti_id
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - MediaSet
    range: integer
    required: true
  identifiers:
    name: identifiers
    description: List of identifying numbers related to this record
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: identifiers
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    - Organization
    range: Identifier
    multivalued: true
  issue:
    name: issue
    description: Issue number for journals or other applicable products if any.
    examples:
    - value: '44'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: issue
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,80}$
  journal_license_url:
    name: journal_license_url
    description: URL for information regarding the journal license for information
    examples:
    - value: https://journal-publishers.com/license/3.02/text
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: journal_license_url
    owner: Record

    owner: Record
    domain_of:

    range: RelatedIdentifier
    multivalued: true
  released_to_osti_date:

      official.

    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: released_to_osti_date
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime

    examples:

    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: releasing_official_comments
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  report_period_end_date:

    alias: report_period_end_date
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime

    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: report_period_start_date
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: datetime
  report_types:
    name: report_types
    description: The type(s) of information or frequency of reporting of information
      in this report.
    examples:
    - value: F
    - value: B
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: report_types
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    multivalued: true
  report_type_other:
    name: report_type_other

    examples:
    - value: OTHERVALUE
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: report_type_other
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,80}$
  sbiz_flag:
    name: sbiz_flag

    examples:
    - value: SBIR
    - value: STTR
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: sbiz_flag
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,6}$
  sbiz_phase:
    name: sbiz_phase
    description: A three-character field constrained to 'I', 'II', 'IIA', 'IIB', or
      'III' indicating the phase of this SBIR/STTR report.
    examples:
    - value: IIB
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: sbiz_phase
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
    pattern: ^.{0,3}$
  sbiz_previous_contract_number:

    examples:

    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000

    domain_of:

    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema

    owner: Record
    domain_of:

    domain_of:

  site_unique_id:

    examples:

    rank: 1000
    alias: site_unique_id
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  site_url:
    name: site_url
    description: (DATASET product type only) The URL of the data set landing page,
      containing links to data set content or additional information as required.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: site_url
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  source_input_type:
    name: source_input_type
    description: Value determined by submission type at record creation time. Defines
      how E-Link record was first entered into the system.
    examples:
    - value: DOE_GRANT_WEBFORM
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: source_input_type
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  source_edit_type:
    name: source_edit_type
    description: Value determined by submission type for each edit or revision of
      a record. Changes on a per-revision basis.
    examples:
    - value: DOE_LAB_API
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: source_edit_type
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: string
  geolocations:
    name: geolocations
    description: List of geolocation references for this record.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/brc/osti_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: geolocations
    owner: Record
    domain_of:
    - Record
    range: Geolocation
    multivalued: true

docs.title: Enum: RelationType
docs.text:
Indicates the relationship between this identifier and the source record.

__

URI: RelationType

docs.title: Permissible Values
docs.text: Value Meaning Description BasedOnData None Cites None indicates that A includes B in a citation Compiles None indicates B is the result of a compile or creation event using A Continues None indicates A is a continuation of the work B Describes None Documents None indicates A is documentation about B Finances None HasComment None HasDerivation None HasMetadata None indicates resource A has additional metadata B HasPart None indicates A includes the part B HasRelatedMaterial None HasReply None HasReview None HasVersion None IsBasedOn None IsBasisFor None IsCitedBy None indicates that B includes A in a citation IsCommentOn None IsCompiledBy None indicates B is used to compile or create A IsContinuedBy None indicates A is continued by the work B IsDataBasisFor None IsDerivedFrom None indicates B is a source upon which A is based IsDescribedBy None IsDocumentedBy None indicates B is documentation about/explaining A IsFinancedBy None IsIdenticalTo None indicates that A is identical to B, for use when there is a need to register ... IsMetadataFor None indicates additional metadata A for a resource B IsNewVersionOf None indicates A is a new edition of B, where the new edition has been modified or... IsObsoletedBy None indicates that A is obsoleted by B IsOriginalFormOf None indicates A is the original form of B IsPartOf None indicates A is a portion of B; may be used for elements of a series IsPreviousVersionOf None indicates A is a previous edition of B IsReferencedBy None indicates A is used as a source of information by B IsRelatedMaterial None IsReplyTo None IsRequiredBy None IsReviewedBy None indicates that A is reviewed by B IsReviewOf None IsSourceOf None indicates A is a source upon which B is based IsSupplementedBy None indicates that B is a supplement to A IsSupplementTo None indicates that A is a supplement to B IsVariantFormOf None indicates A is a variant or different form of B, e IsVersionOf None Obsoletes None indicates that A obsoletes B References None indicates B is used as a source of information for A Requires None Reviews None indicates that A is a review of B

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Description relation

description: 'Indicates the relationship between this identifier and the source record.

  '

permissible_values:

    text: Describes

  Finances:
    text: Finances
  HasComment:
    text: HasComment
  HasDerivation:
    text: HasDerivation
  HasMetadata:

    description: indicates resource A has additional metadata B
  HasPart:
    text: HasPart
    description: indicates A includes the part B
  HasRelatedMaterial:
    text: HasRelatedMaterial
  HasReply:
    text: HasReply
  HasReview:
    text: HasReview
  HasVersion:
    text: HasVersion
  IsBasedOn:
    text: IsBasedOn
  IsBasisFor:
    text: IsBasisFor
  IsCitedBy:
    text: IsCitedBy
    description: indicates that B includes A in a citation
  IsCommentOn:
    text: IsCommentOn
  IsCompiledBy:
    text: IsCompiledBy
    description: indicates B is used to compile or create A
  IsContinuedBy:
    text: IsContinuedBy
    description: indicates A is continued by the work B
  IsDataBasisFor:
    text: IsDataBasisFor
  IsDerivedFrom:
    text: IsDerivedFrom
    description: indicates B is a source upon which A is based
  IsDescribedBy:
    text: IsDescribedBy
  IsDocumentedBy:
    text: IsDocumentedBy
    description: indicates B is documentation about/explaining A
  IsFinancedBy:
    text: IsFinancedBy
  IsIdenticalTo:
    text: IsIdenticalTo
    description: indicates that A is identical to B, for use when there is a need

  IsMetadataFor:
    text: IsMetadataFor
    description: indicates additional metadata A for a resource B
  IsNewVersionOf:
    text: IsNewVersionOf
    description: indicates A is a new edition of B, where the new edition has been
      modified or updated
  IsObsoletedBy:
    text: IsObsoletedBy
    description: indicates that A is obsoleted by B
  IsOriginalFormOf:
    text: IsOriginalFormOf
    description: indicates A is the original form of B
  IsPartOf:
    text: IsPartOf
    description: indicates A is a portion of B; may be used for elements of a series
  IsPreviousVersionOf:
    text: IsPreviousVersionOf
    description: indicates A is a previous edition of B
  IsReferencedBy:
    text: IsReferencedBy
    description: indicates A is used as a source of information by B
  IsRelatedMaterial:
    text: IsRelatedMaterial
  IsReplyTo:
    text: IsReplyTo
  IsRequiredBy:
    text: IsRequiredBy
  IsReviewedBy:
    text: IsReviewedBy
    description: indicates that A is reviewed by B
  IsReviewOf:
    text: IsReviewOf
  IsSourceOf:
    text: IsSourceOf
    description: indicates A is a source upon which B is based
  IsSupplementedBy:
    text: IsSupplementedBy
    description: indicates that B is a supplement to A
  IsSupplementTo:
    text: IsSupplementTo
    description: indicates that A is a supplement to B
  IsVariantFormOf:
    text: IsVariantFormOf
    description: indicates A is a variant or different form of B, e.g. calculated
      or calibrated form or different packaging
  IsVersionOf:
    text: IsVersionOf
  Obsoletes:
    text: Obsoletes
    description: indicates that A obsoletes B
  References:
    text: References
    description: indicates B is used as a source of information for A
  Requires:
    text: Requires
  Reviews:
    text: Reviews
    description: indicates that A is a review of B

docs.title: Subset: RequiresLogin
docs.text:
These repositories require a login to access data. This does not include resources in which data may be private or restricted, but rather those that require a login to access any data.

docs.title: About the BRC Schema
docs.text:
The BRC schema is used with data on the https://bioenergy.org/ data portal.

It is intended to represent metadata most relevant to the DOE bioenergy research community. It has also been designed to align with the data submission schema used by OSTI.gov.

docs.title: Slot: access_limitation_other
docs.text:
Additional information about access/distribution limitation for this record, if needed. Required for CUI or PDOUO designations in access limitation. May contain information about the following: Special handling instructions, Copyright restrictions, Other criteria pertinent to the review, access limitation, announcement, and/or restriction of this STI product.

docs.title: brc_schema
docs.text:
This schema defines the structure for biomolecular and -omics datasets, capturing essential metadata including investigators, affiliations, data citation, organism details, analysis type, and more. These are datasets generated by the Bioenergy Research Centers (BRCs), including CABBI, CBI, GLBRC, and JBEI. As of version 0.1.4, this schema imports the LinkML version of the E-Link schema (see osti_schema.yaml) to promote further interoperability with OSTI records.

URI: https://w3id.org/brc/brc_schema
